mapper.insert: insert into tb_artist(artist_key, genre_names, act_type_name, sex, artist_name,nationality_name, artist_img) values(#{artist_key}, #{genre_names}, #{act_type_name}, #{sex}, #{artist_name},#{nationality_name}, #{artist_img})
mapper.update: update tb_artist set artist_key=#{artist_key}, genre_names=#{genre_names}, act_type_name=#{act_type_name}, sex=#{sex}, artist_name=#{artist_name},nationality_name=#{nationality_name}, artist_img=#{artist_img} where artist_key = #{artist_key}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_album(album_key, artist_key, album_name,artist_name, average_score, issue_date, album_img) values(#{album_key}, #{artist_key}, #{album_name},#{artist_name}, #{average_score}, #{issue_date}, #{album_img})
mapper.update: update tb_album set album_key=#{album_key}, artist_key=#{artist_key}, album_name=#{album_name},artist_name=#{artist_name}, average_score=#{average_score}, issue_date=#{issue_date}, album_img=#{album_img} where album_key = #{album_key}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_song(song_key, album_key, song_name, play_time, issue_date, is_title_song,is_adult,is_hit_song ,is_free,artist_key,artist_name,composition,lyricist,album_img,album_name) values(#{song_key},#{ album_key},#{ song_name},#{ play_time},#{ issue_date},#{ is_title_song},#{is_adult},#{is_hit_song },#{is_free},#{artist_key},#{artist_name},#{composition},#{lyricist},#{album_img},#{album_name})
mapper.update: update tb_song set song_key=#{song_key}, album_key=#{album_key}, song_name=#{song_name}, play_time=#{play_time}, issue_date=#{issue_date}, is_title_song=#{is_title_song},is_adult=#{is_adult},is_hit_song=#{is_hit_song} ,is_free=#{is_free},artist_key=#{artist_key},artist_name=#{artist_name},composition=#{composition},lyricist=#{lyricist},album_img=#{album_img} where song_key = #{song_key}
mapper.select: select album_img from tb_song order by rand() limit 30
mapper.insert: insert into tb_keyword( keyword, count) values(#{searchKeyword},count +1)
mapper.select: select count(keyword) from tb_keyword where keyword = #{searchKeyword}
mapper.update: update tb_keyword set count = count+1 where keyword = #{searchKeyword}
mapper.select: select q.* from (select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rownum, a.* from (select distinct s.song_key, s.song_name,r.recommend_no, s.album_key, s.artist_key, s.artist_name, s.play_time, s.issue_date, s.is_title_song, s.is_hit_song, s.is_adult, s.is_free, s.composition, s.lyricist, s.album_name, s.album_img, s.genre_names from tb_recommend r join tb_song s on r.song_key = s.song_key where r.user_no = #{user_no} order by recommend_no desc) a join (select @RNUM := 0) m) q where rownum between #{pgNation.start_num} and #{pgNation.end_num}
